about_the_game:
Test your skills out in Career Mode and race for the championship against your rivals.  Race on seven different go-kart tracks and earn your spot at the top of the leaderboards.

In an all-new career mode,  pay entry fees,  sell merchandise,  buy kart upgrades and improve your race team over the course of the season.  Can you with the Go-Kart Racing Championship?

FEATURES

  • Full-Season Career Mode

  • Online Trials (Steam Leaderboard Integration)

  • Go-Kart Livery Editor

  • Steam Achievements

  • Aerodynamic Drafting / Slipstream System

  • Improved AI Driver Knowledge and Racing Tactics

QUICK RACES

  • Customize the length of your own races on seven different fictional racetracks.

  • Compete in quick races to practice and improve your speed.

COMPETITIVE AI RACING

  • AI Driver Knowledge and Tactics have been reimagined and improved with overtaking abilities and defensive driving.  AI Drivers will also have personal "attributes" and can cause crashes with other drivers if they are aggressive.

  • Throughout the career, AI Drivers will upgrade the cars and vary in speed.

A gamepad or controller is RECOMMENDED for the greatest driving experience.

name: Go-Kart Racing 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3-Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 220 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Support (In-Race Only)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
